root.name: Kyonshiizu 2
root.description: OverviewThis game by Taito is based on a movie named Kyonshiizu 2, which was a sequel. The game itself does not have a predecessor. The game plays like a graphical adventure game, popular at the time, with additional action sequences. The player must walk around town hunting for clues about the roaming Jiang Shi while occasionally fighting said creatures and other enemies.
